name: Chicken Cross Road
description:
Save the chicks! But beware across the road.

Assets:

  • Road Set 3D model
  • Low Poly Racing Car free 3D model
  • 3D Minecraft - Mob Pack #1
  • Free keyboard and controllers prompts pack

Versions:

  • 0.01 - Submit game for #ue4jam
  • 0.02 - Adjust menu, scale chicken, location chickens and improve spawn cars
